spirit:component.spirit:name: TySOM_2_7Z100_v_cresample_0_0

spirit:component.spirit:description: The Xilinx Chroma Resampler LogiCORE provides users with an easy-to-use IP block for converting between chroma subsampling formats of 4:4:4, 4:2:2, and 4:2:0.
